property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Everything, Everywhere

property.name: Rules
property.value:
[Click]: Flip this identity.
The Runner pays 1[Credits] more when spending a [Click] to remove a tag (not through a card ability).
Flip side:
[Click]: Flip this identity.
You may pay 2[Credits] fewer when spending a [Click] to trash a resource (not through a card ability).

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Your News

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may play 1 current from HQ or Archives (paying its play cost).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing but the Truth.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Worldswide Reach

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time each turn you rez an advertisement, the Runner loses 1[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We're ready to start the fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area. Limit 1 per deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You had your shot, and you blew it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All tracer ice have +1 strength. The base trace strength of each subroutine is increased by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick isn't software, it's hardware. Cyberspace is a collection of physical machines. If we control the machines, we control it all." -KR Kane, "Our Future"

property.name: Rules
property.value: All assets gain advertisement.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody ever lost a dollar by underestimating the taste of the public." -Phineas Taylor Barnum

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Quantum Predictive Model is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. If the Runner is tagged when Quantum Predictive Model is accessed, add it to your score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes and No."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. [Click], remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add to operation to the top of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Live from New Angeles, this is Lily Lockwell."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If News Team is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses News Team, he or she must either take 2 tags or add News Team to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D. [Trash]: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one can bury a story better.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner has 1 fewer [Click] to spend during his or her turn. If Victoria Jenkins is trashed while being accessed, add her to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Reality Threedee, take 1 bad publicity. When your turn begins, gain 1[Credits] (or 2[Credits] if the Runner is tagged).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're gonna try and make you a star. Whether you want it or not." -MaxX

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Tracer-Ambush

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Archangel is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. If you pay 3[Credits] when the Runner accesses Archangel, he or she immediately encounters it. Ignore this ability if Archangel is accessed from Archives. [Subroutine] Trace6 - If successful, add 1 installed Runner card to his or her grip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a current is active, News Hound gains "[Subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines. [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most reporting these days can be done by AI. We just need the talent for the name recognition."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has. [Subroutine] Trace4 - If successful, end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the Olden Times, a 'resistor" was a vital component of practically all electronic equipment. You know, back when dinosaurs roamed the Earth." -Chaos Theory

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Corp gains 5[Credits]. Trash Special Offer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I didn't know better, I'd say they got the better end of that deal." -John Masanori

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: //tl;dr duplicate the subs on the next piece of ice

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner encounters Turnpike, he or she loses 1[Credits]. [Subroutine] Trace5 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stay out of the fast lanes! If speed's your only concern, you're already tagged and halfway to fragged." -g00ru

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda. Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing worse than bad news...

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [Click]. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Choose an agenda in the Runner's score area. Media Blitz gains the text of that agenda.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash all resources. The Runner can remove 1 bad publicity to prevent this.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only with perfect information can we develop the perfect strategy." -The Playbook

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must spend credits first for each trace attempt during a run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash], remove 1 tag: Trash 1 program. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We use ice on our servers. More runners should ice their own rigs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the worlds sitting on the couch and watching threedee, Rutherford District might as well be all of New Angeles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Global Food Initiative is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Corporations are made up of people. It's ridiculous to think they'd be either all good or all bad." -Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 6[Credits] from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[Credits] from Launch Campaign.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace5 - If successful, do 3 net damage. [Subroutine] Trace4 - If successful, trash 1 program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bounce rate is a well-understood measure of ice strength. But it is not the only measure.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Invasive Predator

property.name: Rules
property.value: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn. Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Memory Unit] Trash an installed card: Prevent 1 damage. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Meantime the hellish tattoo of the heart increased. It grew quicker and quicker, and louder and louder evert instant." -Edgar Allan Poe

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash an installed card: Break "[Subroutine] End the run." subroutine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been monitoring the anomaly's activity across the New Angeles Pacifica and Andea trunk lines and associated nodes. I have yet to detect a predictable pattern or even to formulate a theory as to the anomaly's nature." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Harbinger is trashed, install it facedown instead of adding it to your heap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per turn, prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice. [Trash]: Install the top 3 cards of your stack facedown.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's parts of the Network now that are different from how they used to be. I can't put my finger on it; just something twitching at my ganglion through my BMI." -Reeve

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time each turn you trash 1 of your installed cards, gain 1[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Data goes in. Nothing comes out.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Compulsive Hacker

property.name: Rules
property.value: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash up to 5 of your installed cards. Draw 1 card for each card trashed (or 2 cards for each card trashed if you trashed at least 1 directive).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adam raised the hammer. He was free.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +X[Memory Unit] Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2[Recurring Credits] Use these credits to pay for using programs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bioroids have two brains running in parallel, each capable of running sophisticated programming. There are certain advantages to the setup.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your first [Click] each turn must be spent to make a run a play a run event. Once per turn, you can spend [Click][Click] to break a subroutine on a piece of ice currently being encountered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Second Directive requires a bioroid to complete its primary function above all other considerations, save the First Directive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, choose one of your installed cards. The text box of that card is blank for the remainder of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You look tore up, kid. Have a seat, I'll fire up the arc welder."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, you must trash it by paying its trash cost, if able. Whenever you access cards from HQ, access 1 additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Third Directive requires a bioroid to preserve its ability to function and report frequently to Haas-Bioroid for repairs and updates.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your maximum hand size is reduced by 2. When your turn ends, draw 1 card if you do not have cards in your grip equal to or greater than your maximum hand size.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The First Directive forbids a bioroid from harming, or through inaction allowing harm to befall, a human being.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Security Specialist

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mommy will be home soon, sweetie. She has to kick some ass first."

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Choose an icebreaker (or any number of cloud icebreakers). Each chosen icebreaker has +1 strength for each [Link] you have for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fortunately, Globalsec buys them by the case.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Memory Unit] +1[Link] Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may force the Corp to "trace5 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccessful, the Runner bypasses the currently encountered ice." Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 2[Link], the memory cost of GS Striker M1 is 0, even if it is not installed. 2[Credits]: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2[Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 2[Link], the memory cost of GS Shrike M2 is 0, even if it is not installed. 2[Credits]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. 2[Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 2[Link], the memory cost of GS Sherman M3 is 0, even if it is not installed. 2[Credits]: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 2[Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only if you have at least 2[Link]. When your turn begins, you may lose [Click]. If you do, look at the top card of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She approached the server, flashed her credentials, and passed straight through. She wondered what it said about her that doing things the legal way felt like cheating.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each [Link] you have. When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got an early start today...or maybe I forgot to go home last night."

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp's identity text box is blank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are you crazy? We can't send in prisec until the media gets bored and goes home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your stack. Trash the top card of your stack. Gain X[Credits] where X is equal to the install cost of that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She tried to remember who he was. Not that it mattered anymore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you install a piece of hardware or a program, place 1[Credits] from the bank on Technical Writer. [Click],[Trash]: Take all credits from Technical Writer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Technically correct: the best kind of correct.
